Who: Dirge
Location: Minion Earth base - reformatting Chamber

> Lamia transformed to her beast mode and moved towards the pod she laid inside and if snakes could smile she would be smiling

Dirge looked down at Lamia as she shifted into her serpent mode and
got in the pod. With a touch of a button the top slid closed over her,
and quickly enough lights began to change colors.

Energy was infused into the pod as spark energies themselves were fed
into lamia, suffusing her body with power and energy. Information also
was passed to her, tactics, history, data streams of all sorts.

Dirge looked at the read outs with satisfaction, all was going well.

All too quickly the sequence began to come to a close, as the energy
feeds completed their cycle. The information being fed to Lamia
finishes as her body has been rebuilt with far more sophisticated
weaponry and skills.

With a click the cover of Lamia's pod click, hisses and then began to
slide backward.

(TAG)

OOC: I will write you within the next day or so Airly with some of my
thoughts for the upgrades. Its up to  you what you want to take from
this)

Preston
